ygData.subject: RE: Sol hunting
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The entrance is not bugged.  We just went to the wrong place last time.  There are 3, read it, 3 entrance around the lava pool.  When u turn around from
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 21 Sep 1999 09:09:44 +0800, LKW wrote:

>Sol A entrance is bugged. Weeks ago me went with some guys and we managed
>to zone in. Last week I went with Fes/FF/Febon but this time when we try
>to zone in, it teleport us to somewhere in Lava. Fes said Sol A mob are
>deeper (refer to those tat give us xp), while Sol B mob (blue) are closing
>to zone, so in a sense safer.

The entrance is not bugged. We just went to the wrong place last time. There are 3,
read it, 3 entrance around the lava pool. When u turn around from the bugged
entrance, u can see another entrance alone the path. This lead to Sol B where I was
last night. Great fun! I really love the intense action there but well.... it can kill. Hee
hee.


Best Regards,

Tommy Fong
